sub_title: Senior Project Manager & Business Consultant at German-Dutch Chamber of Commerce (dnhk.org), The Hague & Düsseldorf
summary:
Experienced business and recruitment consultant, with sound knowledge of the Benelux and German markets.
- Supporting small and mid-sized companies as well as corporates with their growth and market development in the Benelux and Germany.
- Organiser of German-Dutch business events in both countries, for entrepreneurs, investors & influencers.
- Organiser of trade missions and delegation visits to Germany and the Netherlands and "liaison officer" for/between companies, regional development agencies and authorities.
- DNHK Seminar Programme Manager for Germany and the Netherlands (general seminars and in-company trainings).
- Moderator and host of German-Dutch business events and conferences in Germany and the Netherlands.
- Fluent in Dutch, English, German and Spanish.
- 'Manager' of the LinkedIn Group "Jobs in Deutschland und den Niederlanden".

Business Consultancy, Market Development and Recruitment Consultancy for Dutch and German companies.
Organising and presenting trade missions, business forums and expert networking events, in Germany and the Netherlands. DNHK Seminar Programme Manager for Germany and the Netherlands. Fluent in Dutch, German, English and Spanish.
*****
Bedrijfsadvisering, Marktbewerking en Werving & Selectie voor Nederlandse en Duitse bedrijven.
Organisatie en presentatie van handelsmissies/delegatiereizen en netwerk-evenementen voor ondernemers, vakprofessionals en ambtenaren/ROM's, in Nederland en Duitsland. Programmamanager DNHK Seminar Programma in Duitsland en Nederland. Vloeiend Nederlands, Duits, Engels en Spaans.
*****
Markterschließungs-, Unternehmens- und Personalberatung für deutsche und niederländische Unternehmen.
Organisation und Moderation von Delegationsreisen und Netzwerktreffen für Unternehmer:innen, Fachexpert:innen und Wirtschaftsförder:innen, in Deutschland und den Niederlanden. Bereichsleiter DNHK Seminar-Programm in Deutschland und den Niederlanden. Fließend in Niederländisch, Deutsch, Englisch und Spanisch.
